comments.author: TryNinja
comments.body: I thought about filling the loan, but I won’t for a few reasons:What happens if your signature campaign ends or you get kicked out? I particularly don’t think your posts are that great (after a quick look at your post history), so this is at least a medium-risk scenario IMO.I saw that you were late to repay shasan on your last loan with him, and I noticed the reason could’ve been that you couldn’t post as normally and thus didn’t get enough money on your campaign (?), possibly meaning that no campaign = no money to repay. Then you tried to get another loan for $500 and got denied.Nothing personal, just thought you would like to know.
